resources.string: -> I-Township is web based portal. In this project, We are going to develop the java based software which involves management of a Society. In this portal, the chairman of society suggests the idea for completing such tasks. This task involves management of society from different areas of interest.

-> By accessing this portal user can view whether the work of society has done or not, can complain, give suggestion, take part in E-voting, view a VR sitemap on the portal. The chairman maintains detail about all the Modules.

-> It is very useful for the members of society. The portal provides the notifications on an android application, gives attractive user interaction functionalities. So we can achieve more suggestions from user and task will be performed in proper manner.
A> Space on a website is practically limitless, and it can hold text, images, audio, and video, making it more versatile than any other marketing platform in the world.
B> Handle online marketing projects ranging from SEO to social media marketing.
C> Ensure website functionality and perform software updates.
D> Monitor, assess, and report on website performance.
E> Ensure domain registration and hosting are current.
A> Manager roles can be created for Office Staff.
B> Discuss Facility Management Issues and other Improvement Areas within the Admin Team.
C>Close the Meeting and share the Report by Email to all Invitees.
D> Verify if all documents have been submitted by member and generate defaulters report.
A> Resident accounts can be added, approved, deactivated.Bulk upload from spreadsheet to create Resident Accounts.
B> Admin Access to users provided from this Application.
C> Manager roles can be created for Office Staff.
D> Search on Any Family Information, Vehicle Information, User, Part Phone number etc.
A> Residents can pay their dues online through Payment Gateway provided by PayU.
B> Instant E-Receipts is generated and their Dues get cleared off.
C> Facility Booking, Move in/out charges, Festival ticketing can all be done easily through Payment Gateway.
D> Verify if all documents have been submitted by member and generate defaulters report.
